title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 134.6 - Responsibilities of a program participant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 134.6 - Responsibilities of a program participant

State Regulations
(a) A program participant: (1)
must notify the program in writing of a
change in the program participant's contact information at least seven days in
advance of the change, or immediately thereafter if such change is necessitated
by an emergency or other unforeseen event; (2)
must notify the program of any
significant change in the information contained in their application; and
(3)
must return the
identification card to the program immediately upon withdrawal or cancellation
of participation in the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
134.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
